sense.def:
To be overwhelmed by a feeling or event
pomeni biti pod močnim vplivom določenega čustva ali dogodka.

seg.quote: He was overwhelmed by the intensity of her love.
The horror of it all had overwhelmed me.

sense.def:
Kadar skupina ljudi
overwhelms a place or another group
, dobi nadzor nad nekim območjem ali drugo skupino ljudi.

seg.quote: Their mission was to seize the bridges and overwhelm the garrison.
